dict.acceptation: 共同的，联合的；共享的；两院的；连带的，共同的；
[解]关节；接合处；下流场所；一块烤肉（英式英语）；
结合，联合；为…装上接头，使…有接缝；

sent.orig: Traditional grouted pointing methods mainly are high joint, bed joint and hollow joint.
sent.trans: 传统的浆砌勾缝方法主要有三种：凸缝、平缝和凹缝。

sent.orig: Bonnet joint varies from flat face gasket-joint to ring-type bonnet joint, depending on class.
sent.trans: 阀盖连接方式从平面垫圈连接到环形阀盖连接，压力等级不同，连接方式也有所不同。

sent.orig: In other words, joint offence without joint act does not necessarily bear joint and several liability.
sent.trans: 有共同过错但无共同行为的情况不承担连带责任。

sent.orig: Joint torts with related faults include joint injuries and non-joint injuries.
sent.trans: 有过错联系的共同侵权行为可以分为共同加害行为和非共同加害行为。

sent.orig: Basically are two types of joint equity joint venture and contractual joint venture.
sent.trans: 基本上有两种合资企业：股权式合资企业和契约式合作企业。
